Description: Hindi is one of the most widely spoken languages in India. It has a rich script and diverse vocabulary.

Vowels.Description: Vowels in Hindi are called 'Swar.' They play a crucial role in pronunciation and word formation.

Consonants.Description: Consonants in Hindi are known as 'Vyanjan.' They are the building blocks of Hindi words and carry distinct sounds.

Common Phrases.Description: Here are some phrases in Hindi that will be useful in everyday conversations
List: कैसे हो आप? (Kaise ho aap?) - How are you?
मैं ठीक हूँ (Main theek hoon) - I am fine
क्या हाल है? (Kya haal hai?) - How are you?
बहुत धन्यवाद (Bahut Dhanyavaad) - Thank you very much
मुझे बहुत अच्छा लगा (Mujhe bahut accha laga) - I liked it very much
यह कैसा है? (Yeh kaisa hai?) - How is this?
क्या आप मुझे मदद कर सकते हैं? (Kya aap mujhe madad kar sakte hain?) - Can you help me?
मैं आपसे मिलकर खुश हुआ (Main aapse milkar khush hua) - Nice to meet you
कहाँ रहते हो? (Kahan rehte ho?) - Where do you live?

Practice.Description: Practice these sentences to improve your Hindi language skills.
Sentences: मैं अच्छा हूँ। (Main accha hoon) - I am good.
तुम कैसे हो? (Tum kaise ho?) - How are you?
मेरा नाम साहिल है। (Mera naam sahil hai) - My name is sahil.
यह किताब है। (Yeh kitaab hai) - This is a book.
मैं भूखा हूँ। (Main bhukha hoon) - I am hungry.
